jobs.title: 2025 Midyear Global Outlook: Getting a grip on uncertainty
jobs.description: U.S. policy shifts and elevated uncertainty mark the evolution of the new macro regime. Identifying the defining features of this environment is critical now. We have more certainty about near-term outcomes than long term – keeping us positive on risk assets and U.S. stocks. Mega forces like AI are the new driver of durable returns.

jobs.title: Explore more
jobs.description: As a global investment manager and fiduciary to our clients, our purpose at BlackRock is to help everyone experience financial well-being. Since 1999, we've been a leading provider of financial technology, and our clients turn to us for the solutions they need when planning for their most important goals.

jobs.title: Mega forces: An investment opportunity
jobs.description: Aging populations in major economies are poised to limit how much countries can produce and grow. By contrast, selected emerging market economies can benefit from younger populations and growing middle classes.

jobs.title: Supporting our Veterans and Allies
jobs.description: BlackRock recognizes the challenges transitioning veterans face and the importance of supporting their professional careers. We engage with, sponsor and support programs that honor and assist veterans and their families.

jobs.title: BlackRock Empowers Veterans: Building Futures Across Continents
jobs.description: The Program gives participants the opportunity to work at the world’s largest asset manager for six months, leading to potential permanent roles upon successful completion. Participants gain real-world experience, professional mentorship, and exposure to our organization's senior leaders, enhancing and supporting their transition to civilian work.

jobs.title: Interested in coming back to BlackRock as a boomerang?
jobs.description: Boomerangs are employees who left BlackRock in the past and came back to join us as One BlackRock.
